title: (44003) Teruel - 1 Calle la Calera
description: Very quiet parking day and night in the center of Teruel. It's a free public site

title: (44003) Teruel - 1 , bajo Carretera Alcañiz
description:
Lavanderia Autoservicio - Fairly good price, parking nearby on residential side streets, a bit narrow but fine for us in 6.5m motorhome. Parking also available at Lidl across the bridge 3 minutes walk away.
No detergent needed, cycles take ~30 minutes

title: (44193) Teruel - Avenida Conexión Barrios
description: Esplanade with newly planted trees. There are no services. We have stopped to eat and the place is not bad to stop. Large room with more or less level ground. Mountain views next to a walk.

title: (44001) Teruel - 5 Carretera Villaspesa
description: Asphalted parking without services but comfortable. Five minutes from downtown.

title: (44001) Teruel - 5 Carretera Villaspesa
description: Parking on the ground in front of the station. Without services but very close to the road that connects the center. Be careful, large puddles of rain are formed during intense rainy days.

title: (44003) Teruel - 3F Calle la Florida
description: Ground parking under the new and old viaducts, ideal for visiting the city, near the steps and 10 minutes from the center (Plaza del Torico). we spend the day, we don't sleep

title: (44001) Teruel - 9 Carretera Villaspesa
description: If you have maneuverability problems in the station car park (or if it is full); or if the overhang hits you on the dirt road (or it's flooded), you can park on all this straight without a problem. It is not a blue zone, and it is one step away from the Center. To spend the night I would go to the area.

title: (44193) Teruel - Avenida Conexión Barrios
description: Close to the free service area (service station listed Park4night) beautiful view and walking path

title: (44003) Teruel - 85 Carretera San Julián
description: Low cost gas station with drinking water filling area and emptying gray and black water. If you need fuel it is grateful to refuel.

title: (44002) Teruel - 9 Calle Cofiero
description: Large parquing of land just the side of the railway station.

title: (44002) Teruel - 78 Avenida de Sagunto
description: Laundry, clean and friendly. Owner takes care personally.

title: (44002) Teruel - 22D Camino Castralvo
description: Wide asphalt parking for large motorhomes. Right next to a large dirt / gravel esplanade where vehicles of all sizes park.

title: (44002) Teruel - Calle de Antonio Mingote
description: Ample parking, weekends a bit of fuss with cars and motorcycles early in the evening. For the rest, ok. Near several bars for lunch and dinner

title: (44195) Teruel - 162D Urbanización la Paz
description: Gas station with services.

title: (44002) Teruel - 7B Travesía 2 Ramón J. Sender
description: The area of parking, located in front of the barracks of the civil guard, and Mercadona supermarket with bakery nearby many spaces to park and safe have parked here many times for an overnight stay

title: (44002) Teruel - 1 Calle Arquitecto Muñoz Gómez
description: Gravel plot behind Mercadona.

title: (44193) Teruel - Travesía de Sagunto
description: Parking next to the supermarket. Fountain with water. A pair of cafeterias-restaurant and a McDonalds very close. Together with Dinopolis. The coordinates are those of the part of the car park with the best shade. The water source is on the opposite side next to the children's games.

title: (44002) Teruel - 5 Calle Profesor Francisco Grande Covián
title_short: (44002) Teruel - 5 Calle Profesor Francisco Grande Covián
description: Self-service laundry. Open from 7:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m. Washing machine. Clothes dryer. Only with coins, but there is the changer.

title: (44002) Teruel - 2 Travesía de Sagunto
description: Municipal motorhome area.

title: (44002) Teruel - Calle los Enebros
description: It is an area with trees and three picnic tables, a drinking water fountain, and a litter bin, easy parking.

title: (44002) Teruel - 138 Avenida de Sagunto
description: Parking in front of Dinopolis park, there are always motorhomes in the park at night.

title: (44162) Teruel - Capital. Vía Minera
description: At the foot of the black-eyed greenway. Next to the old Teruel train station. There are picnic areas. Quiet place to spend the night. The building provides shade for the van. Access is only allowed with vans, motorhomes do not fit because you have to cross a bridge.

title: (44190) Villaspesa -
description: Small car park at the foot of the canyon, probably in the bed of the river when it appears (be careful if it rains). We spent one night alone in the world, the dream! slight road noise in the distance, no service but definitely one of the best places we have slept in. the next day, two campers were there when we were going to leave, it didn't have so much charm anymore, that's for sure.

title: () Teruel - Unnamed Road
description: Location for a van, it is not flat you need coves, quiet, no noise away from everything and near a very beautiful small lagoon. No service Please leave the place clean!

title: (44190) Teruel - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot at the gates of Canon Rojo. Magnificent walk with views worthy of the most beautiful Westerns ... No prohibition. Only for dry weather.

title: (44190) Villaspesa -
description: In the middle of ocher mountains, absolute calm, 4G network ok. Path potentially difficult to access in bad weather, no problem in dry weather

title: (44190) Villaspesa -
description: Flat place to park the AC to be able to walk the red canyon. the road/path is two-way but only one AC fits. you can also park before entering the road and walk in.

title: (44190) Villaspesa -
description: Really beautiful place we did not sleep there but it would be without any problem in dry weather. We stayed in the perfectly passable riverbed. Worth a visit even for a picnic

title: (44162) Teruel - Camino de La Laguna
description: A lot of space near a small lake surrounded by hills. In the afternoon the shepherd will pass with his sheep’s. The way up to this spot is all gravel roads with some small rivers to pass, but no problem for our Mercedes Benz van.

title: (44397) Teruel - Camino de Concud a San Blas
title_short: (44397) Teruel - Camino de Concud a San Blas
description: Large free parking in the background of industrial zone. Very calm night. Extremely easy access and very large spaces. Practically flat and fully tarred. No services. No prohibition.

address.street: Camino de Concud a San Blas

title: (44193) Teruel - Camino de las Suertes
description: Nature space with enough places. Swimming pool, bar, games for children, picnic tables. Not suitable for larger motorhomes.

title: (44195) San Blas - 2 Calle la Iglesia
description: Parking next to the health center, school, playground, covered fronton. We left the car there to do the river walk to the San blas reservoir and then we slept there. the road is good to enter. The car park enabled to make the River Walk to San Blas has a very bad, narrow entrance and it is given to the ground floor, so we came to this other one that is very good. There is no supermarket in town, the one at the bar sold us bread.

title: (44195) San Blas - 62 Carretera Toril
description: Parking beginning / end of the hike of "Camino Natural del Guadalaviar" in the middle of the gorge. Very close to the village of San Blas but still with the feeling of being isolated. Entry a little tricky, but no problem for vans. A lot of doggies and walkers during the day. Ps: Excellent ride!

title: (44195) San Blas - 62 Carretera Toril
description: Hello parking at the exit of the village ideal for large Camping Car the first one at the bottom next to the bridge is too narrow to enter the start of a hiking trail to visit the gorges of the river by following the path we arrive directly at the dam And return by the gorges or vice versa

title: (44193) Teruel - N-234
description: Area with tables to eat, with trees for shade, 5km from the A23.

title: (44195) Teruel - Unnamed Road
description: Nice little place not far from the lake (5 minutes walk) along the upper portion of the path that crosses the gorge. Perfect to be quiet! The path is correct with some delicate portions but no worries for the vans.

title: (44195) Teruel - 11 Calle Pant Arquillo
description: Embalse del Arquillos de San Blais. Parking on edge of reservoir. No services.  Stunning walks down the gorge (suitable for firm of foot)

title: (44195) Teruel - Camino Pantano
description: The High of Arquillo (Plateau) Hunting parking, ideal for 1 or 2 nights in the countryside with views of the embankment of Arquillo

title: (44162) Villalba Baja - 1C Calle San José
description: Free drinking water fountain

title: (44130) Villastar - 14 Calle Nevera
description: On the roadside 2 fountains 100m from each other. Not connected to water network

title: (44162) Villalba Baja - 9 Calle Torrevieja
description: Parking is along the playground. attention access to the small motorhome 5m80 max. if it rains to avoid. possibility of spending a night.

title: (44195) San Blas - Cam. de la Hontanilla
title_short: (44195) San Blas - Cam. de la Hontanilla
description:
If you are looking for a secluded place with peace, here it is.
However, it can only be driven on with a 4x4 and, if possible, with gear reduction. Descent/ ascent a bit steep, scree.

title: (44195) Teruel - Unnamed Road
description: Very beautiful view and absolute calm

title: (44121) El Campillo - 11 Calle Iglesia
description: Great to stop and eat on the way. It has shades, benches to sit on and a playground. You can park in the same park.

title: (44396) Teruel - Unnamed Road
description: Flat place with nice view over the plain. Directions 1km field / gravel road. Good for a stopover Zaragossa / Valencia. No service.

title: (44121) Teruel - Camino del Molinazo
description: Very good place on the reservoir in the middle of nature with a beautiful panoramic view, several places to spend the night at different heights. To the water 2 minutes on foot, depending on the water level. Very easy offroad access. Very good advice for hiking: The "Camino Natural Guadalaviar" 3 kilometers from San Blas. It starts below the dam. When you're here, make sure you do!

title: (44195) San Blas -
description: Slightly flatter plateau than the place below. Incredibly beautiful view. Please take your rubbish with you. Thanks very much

title: (44121) El Campillo - Unnamed Road
description: Nice place with picnic tables. Possibility of barbecue. In summer there may be mosquitoes due to the small nearby lagoon. To get there you have to take a 1km track of mud and stone, ok for a van

title: (44396) - Unnamed Road
description: A sudden desire to be alone in the world: this is the place to come. But it must be earned: access path of several kilometers in the ground. Relatively rolling for the most part but at the end a small descent with some gullies make me recommend this place for 4X4 or crossover. Then it's up to you to see by evaluating on foot before committing (easy possibility of parking and even turning around before the descent: therefore BE CAREFUL not to put yourself in a complicated situation !!!). Basically, you will travel easily on the huge plateau of Teruel airport and you will only have 300 m more difficult downhill to access the canyon (or artificial lake). Absolute calm, unspoiled nature, just a few very nice and respectful fishermen in the early morning.

title: (44396) Teruel - Camino del Santo
description: Site with easy access between cereal fields next to a hermitage with spectacular views from height to valley and nature. Ideal for sleeping to be very quiet. There is no shade so on sunny or hot days it can be uncomfortable. Departure from the A-1512 road from Albarracin to Teruel just after passing the cemetery of planes. Eye, entry road is dirt and poorly visible

title: (44162) Cuevas Labradas - 12 Calle Eras Alta
description: Parking in the village.

title: (44162) Peralejos - N-420
description: Parking area to eat or rest. No services.

title: (44121) Rubiales, Aragon -
description: Parking near a small lagoon. Picnic area and barbecue. Night parking is tolerated but it is strictly forbidden to go in the grass. 600 euros fine according to the premises. Please respect

title: (44131) Tramacastiel - Camino Fuensanta
description: Parking of the Sanctuary of Fuensanta, near Villel. There are trash bins, picnic tables, barbecues, and a non-potable water source. We spent the night very calm. From here you can make the path to the Barranco del Tranco

title: (44370) Cella -
description: Parking in which many trucks with hostel accommodation and barbecue are parked. The prices of the bar are cheap and the parking is under video surveillance. Ideal for a stop on the A23.

title: (44121) Rubiales - 1 Calle Arrabal
description: Esplanade above the village of Rubiales above the hermitage. Place for 2 vehicles.

title: (44440) Formiche Alto - C. Arrabal
description: In the sports center, there is garbage, a picnic area, very quiet

title: (44370) Cella - 10 Calle Matadero
description: Day and night parking annexed to all municipal services (sports areas, educational centers, health center, day center, etc.). Quiet place to spend the night, avoid Friday from 7h to 15h per market. Distance from 20 km to Teruel and Albarracin

title: (44370) Cella - 57 Avenida de la Fuente
description: Laundry service with drying. Really clean, the machines are accepting .50, 1 and 2 euro coins though they don’t return changes. It is open from 8:00-22:00 every day.

name: Camping Casa Fausto

description: Camping

title: (44147) Cedrillas -
description: High plateau with juniper bushes, wide view, very sunny, absolute tranquility.

title: (44121) Bezas - A-1513
description: Incredible views, no parking from 22 to 7 in the morning.

title: (44155) Cedrillas - TE-V-8001
description: Hiking parking lot, great view. Sunny position.

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 13 Calle Eras Prado Verde
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 13 Calle Eras Prado Verde
description: Quiet parking 5 minutes from downtown. There are no houses, only small agricultural warehouses. Near the highway. The best access is from the road along Calle Balsillas. The noise of the vehicles that circulate on the highway can be heard a little.

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 6 Calle Balsillas
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 6 Calle Balsillas
description: Drinking water point, with fillet.

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Pk 100 Autovía Mudéjar
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Pk 100 Autovía Mudéjar
description: Right in front of the Javalambre recreational area, in front of the black and gray water point behind the cepsa gas station. There is room for about 6-8 AC or cars. The Civil Guard has authorized us (December 2021) to spend the night here, opposite there is an area for trucks that they have recommended us to avoid (problematic)

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde -
description: The CEPSA service station, with a black-grey water point and filling with clean ones, it gives to fill up to clean the black ones and more

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Pk 100 Autovía Mudéjar
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Pk 100 Autovía Mudéjar
description: It's a new service area right after the gas station. They have a restaurant called Javalambre, with a menu from 7am to 11pm. They have 3 showers next to immaculate toilets and according to one of the waiters, but if you have lunch or dinner they don't charge you. They also sell bread, sweets, sausages and local cheeses. For the passage area it is good. To sleep I don't think, near the highway and a lot of user traffic in the area.

title: (44133) Tramacastiel -
description: It is the parking lot of the hermitage of Santa Maria, 1 km from the town and with beautiful views, a quiet place, without services. We spent one night. It's pretty flat.

title: (44110) Gea de Albarracín - 228 Diseminado
description: Parking in small open field in front of the interpretation center of the Roman Aqueduct. It is at the beginning of the route to section V of the aqueduct, it is about 850m. Level and without services

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - TE-620
description: Small but bright with large parking lot on the station level. No trains at night, very quiet. Beginning of rail traffic at 8:30 am. 1 km from the gas station with water service and wc. The green way to Teruel or Valencia goes through there.

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 18 Calle Patín
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - 18 Calle Patín
description: Parking area. There are locations for vans in each corner of the laundry room. Easy access from C. Estudiante. Playground, picnic tables, water fountain, garbage cans, old washhouse. Very quiet town.

title: (44133) Tramacastiel - 2 Carretera
description: Tramacastiel (Teruel) rural village near the capital Teruel. Where you can enjoy several hiking trails. 1- At the source of the Turia River. 2- An itinerary of the whole mountain area with incredible places. This is a picnic area next to the municipal pool with a river water barbecue, although it does have a fountain that does not work at the moment. There are sinks but they are closed, I do not know if talking with someone from the town hall would allow access. Highly recommended for those seeking tranquility and rural areas. There is also an inn, La Hosteria Barbacana, where you will have an exquisite treatment with the owner and the worker, both are helpful and resolute, they make some homemade meals in the area and within reach of all pockets.

title: (44121) Bezas - A-1513
description: Dornaque Interpretive Center parking lot in the Rodeno Pines Protected Landscape. Nights allowed. No services apart from two garbage containers.

title: (44160) Alfambra -
description: Quiet place to spend the night, you can't hear the road and it has a fountain.

title: (44110) Gea de Albarracín - 62 Calle Gonzalez Palencia
title_short: (44110) Gea de Albarracín - 62 Calle Gonzalez Palencia
description: Parking in picnic area. Beginning of the Barranco de los Asnos route, section IV of the Roman Aqueduct. There is a trash can and some tables but no service. It is a river canyon, do not go in the rainy season.

title: (44132) Libros - Paseo Turia
description: Picnic area with tables. There are shadows and garbage cans. Attached to the Turia River.

title: (44126) Albarracín - A-1513
description: Good fountain recreation area. Super nice area with a few parking spaces, many picnic tables, playground, and barbecue area. I don't know how to spend the night, but eating is super good.

title: (44126) Albarracín - A-1512
description: Next to the Guadalaviar river, 1 km from Gea de Albarracín, direction Albarracín. Municipal area with barbecues and tables, you can swim with caution, as in all rivers. Very pleasant and great to spend the day or at least take a nap.

title: (44409) Teruel - 1 Partida Diseminados
description:
Site with tables, water and barbecue
Very quiet place where we spent a night to do the Via Ferrata that is nearby

title: (44160) Alfambra -
description: Hermitage museum of Santa Ana, paved next to the road with almost no traffic, tables to eat and space to park or sleep. No shade until the trees grow

title: (44161) Escorihuela - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet area, with a fountain and covered and outdoor picnic areas. There are barbecue areas. It has almost no trees. There is a building of the Escorihuela town hall, with tables and benches, but it is closed and has no signs. perfect for an overnight stay.

title: (44380) Villarquemado - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet place, with the proximity of the lagoon with diverse birds. Gentle, simple and pleasant walk place. Mosquitoes insured given the proximity to water.

title: (44132) Libros - 104 Paseo Turia
description: Large fallow land at the cemetery above the village, used as a depot for stones, building rubble, etc. Suitable for overnight stays, especially since nothing else can be found far and wide.

title: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra -
description: Perfect place to spend a quiet moment

title: (44147) Cedrillas - 9 Calle la Guarda
description: Picnic area on the Paseo del Rio Mijares, quiet, spacious, clean and careful space. No indication about motor homes, we spend the night very comfortable and quiet. At 200m center of Cedrillas, a beautiful town and worth visiting. A 4 km public motorhome services area of Monteagudo del Castillo.

title: (44147) Cedrillas - 3 Carretera Alcalá
description: Cedrillas Nice quiet parking space. Flat place.

title: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - TE-34
description: Hermitage of San Roque outside Camarena de la Sierra. Next to the trail that goes to the source of Matahombres. There is shade nearby and a cool fountain.

title: (44409) El Castellar - 12 Travesía Santa Bárbara
description: Small and quiet picnic area in a remote area of Teruel. Ideal to visit with children who love dinosaurs, as it is on the Dinópolis territory route. Fit 2 or 3 vans. There is hardly any shade, but its great attraction is a natural pool of spring water. Be careful, pick up your garbage, respect nature and the rest of the neighbors.

title: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - TE-34
description: Start of track with partially stabilized area, level. Mountains all around. No service, not even a trash can, leave the place at least as clean as when you arrived!

title: (44126) Albarracín - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet place to spend the night. Next to the road without traffic and right in front of it a very beautiful area where there are mushrooms.

title: (44126) Albarracín - Unnamed Road
description: Parking for walking, climbing etc in Albarracín climbing area between 8am and 10pm. No overnights allowed (please obey so we do not lose climbing access and clean up after yourself!!!) Overnight parking permitted back out towards Albarracín, 5 minute drive, up on the hill - Also on park4night :)

title: (44132) Barrio de las Minas - Unnamed Road
title_short: (44132) Barrio de las Minas - Unnamed Road
description:
A parking lot for the visit of ruins of a mining village. Nice view and, at least Christmas 2017, absolutely lonely.
There is a parking lot on the street (sign with "Dinoland") but we did not find any dinosaurs.
Another, which was used by us, is located further up the mountain.
There is no supply or disposal. Please take trash with you.

title: (44126) Albarracín - A-1512
description: Lots of space by the river. Generally quiet.

title: (44133) Riodeva -
description: Water draining and refill point at the hostel, parking at the Titania gate of the dinopark, be careful when arriving in the city do not follow the Titania signs and turn right where the area is indicated. You must ask the hostel to recharge. The hostel has a large terrace for dining. From there you can go to the waterfalls.

title: (44126) Albarracín - 9 A-1512
description: Departure parking for the visit of the Gallo-Roman aqueduct. Very calm. Ideal for day and night. Warning: no shade and sloping (allow the wedges)

title: (44147) Cedrillas -
description: Source of the river mijares

title: (44430) Valbona -
description: Lugar muy tranquilo y apartado, prácticamente rodeado de agua. No dispone de servicios más allá de un pequeño parque infantil y de las vistas y tranquilidad de la zona. Para acceder deberás de subir un camino un poco deteriorado pero corto, fácil y accesible. Perfecto para furgos o 4x4.

title: (44430) Valbona -
description: Secluded site 3km from the town we do not take out chairs or table or cook in case the police put problems, during the day it is a coming and going of people but at night there is no one, 100m from the picnic area there is a recreational area of the dam with slide and very accessible to take a bath and water activities there was some kayak and some fishing but most of them bathing

title: (46141) Cuesta del Rato -
description: Aside of a very quiet mountain  road offering  really nice 180 degrees vast panorama. Stayed here 1 night , alone and silent close to nature

title: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
title_short: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of the Lapiaz sector of the Javalambre ski resort. Very quiet area with good views. Fresh in summer. In winter influx of people through the ski resort. In the station still being closed there are bins and soda machines. Possibility of going to the mountain shelter of Rabada and Navarro open all year and very close to the parking lot. Equally easy access to the Javalambre peak. Deer and wild animals area. Good access and asphalting. Recommended to go down to the town of Camarena de la Sierra. From here there are forest tracks that access various points of the Javalambre mountain range.

title: (44155) El Pobo - 3 TE-8001
description: New area of ​​motorhomes in the Sierra de El Pobo. privileged place for its tranquility 40 km from Teruel, two hours from Valencia. It is also a few minutes from the ski resorts Javalambre and Valdelinares. Patron festivities in summer. Walks and peace.

title: (44126) Albarracín - Unnamed Road
description: Parking area planned for the night in a protected environment. 2 km from Albaracin and 2 km from a magnificent parking (pine forest, rock paintings). Authorised overnight parking.

title: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - Carretera Forestal Pico de Javalambre
title_short: (44459) Camarena de la Sierra - Carretera Forestal Pico de Javalambre
description: Parking of the Sabina sector javalambre station at the foot of the slopes and

title: (44126) Albarracín - 17 Camino de Gea
description: Public parking of the park of Dinopolis. Authorization to spend the night, information given by the tourist office. Do not put yourself in the parking lot in front of the park but the next one, next to the hiking trails

title: (44146) Monteagudo del Castillo - 17 Calle Santa Bárbara
title_short: (44146) Monteagudo del Castillo - 17 Calle Santa Bárbara
description: Service area for emptying gray water, black water and filling clean water. Open the taps located under the small cast iron plate to get water. Parking 1 motorhome at the location of the area otherwise you have to stand on the edge of the street. The easiest way to get there is to take the road that passes next to the "Virgen del Pilar" hermitage.

title: (44126) Albarracín -
description: Motorhome area with 60-meter pitches, cetac electrical connection (blue), water loading and unloading, sinks, washing machine, picnic area, grass area, wifi, guarded, fenced, possibility of booking with pverde app

name: Camping de Albarracin
title: (44126) Camping de Albarracin
description: Pay campground near town with good clean facilities (showers, laundry sinks, wash up sinks, etc.)

title: (44122) Jabaloyas - 1 Calle Mesón
description: Beautiful town declared a Historic-Artistic Site, without slopes, wide esplanade with a water tap in the center, another fountain next to the Town Hall, Church with a defensive wall, hiking and mountain biking initiation point.

title: (44134) El Cuervo, Aragon - Unnamed Road
description: Picnic area with quiet parking. 2 km from El Cuervo. It is the beginning of the route of the narrows of the river Ebron. You can park and spend the night, there is no sign that prohibits it. The entrance is a bit narrow but it is accessible.

title: (44126) Albarracín - 11 Camino Santo Cristo
description:
Public parking, there were still 7 mobile homes here. Very quiet and nice view, near the beautiful town and the tourist office. some small shops nearby. on Wednesdays, part of the parking lot would be used for the market.
The council allows overnight stays, although the prohibition sign at the entrance to the car park has not yet been removed.

title: (44126) Albarracín -
description: Location about 3.4 km from Albarracin along a road with little traffic at night on the edge of a shady river. Very pleasant quiet night.

title: (44126) Albarracín - 2 A-1512
description: Beside the river, small and charming place, we slept several nights and without problem, there is a very beautiful river path

title: (44126) Albarracín - 14 A-1512
description: Parking 4 spaces no prohibitions

title: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Carretera Forestal Pico de Javalambre
title_short: (44450) La Puebla de Valverde - Carretera Forestal Pico de Javalambre
description: Ski in ski out at the top of Javalambre ski resort

title: (44126) Albarracín - 2B Calle Puentes
description: Small quiet car park to rest with a van

title: (44430) Valbona - 1X Calle la Pileta
description: Parking in the village. Rectangular and very spacious square with space for several motorhomes. To spend a couple of days in the vicinity of Valdelinares is an ideal location

title: (44126) La Vega - 5 A-1512
description: Gas station to refuel and possibility of refilling water asking for permission

title: (44126) Albarracín - 1 Calle Puentes
description: Small free parking. Nearby playground, next to the river bank. Ideal for visiting the city. Its access is curved with a small unevenness with which you have to be a little careful not to touch the bottom. Otherwise, highly recommended

title: (44126) La Vega - A-1512
description: Picnic area with parking area next to the road, very quiet and with very beautiful views. You can stay overnight. It has picnic areas and the river is next to it.

title: (44126) Albarracín - A-1512
description: Very good place to visit Albarracin. However prohibited parking from 8 pm to 8 am

title: (44360) Santa Eulalia - A-1511
description: Stopping place en route, with a fountain for filling with a lot of pressure, shade and a stone table. Stuck on the road.

title: (44382) Aguatón - Unnamed Road
description: It is a hermitage where we spend the night to see Baja Aragón. Being a sports competition there were more people camping. The rest of the year I suppose it will be a quiet place where at most people will come to have barbecues in the places set up for it. To get there you have to leave the A23 motorway in the direction of Aguaton, cross the small town of 18 inhabitants and after a few km of asphalt and then a good road you arrive at the site. There is a hermitage with a dining area with a fairly long table already covered. There are 2 booths enabled to make a fire. To sleep, there is a big tree next to the hermitage. It has a fountain and garbage cans. If anyone is going to use this site to see the competition that takes place at the end of July, it is an ideal site, they pass by the road and it looks very good.

title: (44126) Albarracín - A-1512

title: (44460) Sarrión - 138 Avenida Goya

You can spend the night alone without problems. There is a water drain just in front of the car park. I do not know if possible drain gray water or not. In front of the fountain, you have a small place to sit and have lunch. Stay still discrete.

It is somewhat uneven, the straightest place to park is where the van is seen in the photos. Easy access with any vehicle. There is also a garbage container. The Civil Guard came and there was no problem staying overnight.

title: (44167) Camañas -
description:
Very quiet space in the middle of nowhere. reachable by most camper vans. 

lots of great spots around here, this one had quite decent internet and a view of the next valley. 

Google maps is not super trustworthy around here, doublecheck with satellite view to find the right spot, or park on one of many alternatives.

Bread sale opposite.

Cold water showers and bathrooms inside the pool.
Supermarket and bar very close.

title: (44126) Calomarde - A-1704

title: (44126) Calomarde - A-1704
description: Before reaching the source we find an access with a bridge. A dirt road begins that accesses different spaces where you can park. We parked at the back under some trees. He is totally alone and although the road is close and you can see the cars do not bother. The space is totally level. Full nature.

title: (44168) Galve - Unnamed Road
description: Night area between the dinosaur park and the picnic area in the city of Galve. To get to the area, you have to cross the whole village and at the end of everything, take a dirt road (ignore the indications given by Dinopolis). Very quiet place to sleep surrounded by dinosaurs since it is the first city where they found traces of dinosaurs. When entering the city, there is a fenced pavilion where you can observe the footprints of dinosaurs. The sleeping area is a flat wooded area with picnic tables. From this point you can make another route, we follow the course of the river. No water or toilet.

title: (44168) Galve -
description: Area with barbecues and picnic tables, next to a stream and a life-size statue of a dinosaur. There are no bins so keep clean. It is reached by a 1.5km dirt track from Galve. The tour with a motorhome must be difficult, better vans.

description: Paying area for motorhomes recently opened in the summer of 2022. There is a panel with QR code at the entrance to pay for entry and receive a code.It has a shaded picnic area, barbecue, water filling and emptying area, it is not paved but it is very well leveled. Tourist information point. Bathroom that closes when the staff of the tourist office leaves. Next to the town and at the beginning of the route through the Barranco de la Hoz (spectacular).  Thanks to the municipality of Calomarde!

description: Charming town of LOS CEREZOS Right next to Manzanera, the fountain is near the Area, in the main square. The pools are next to the town near De la Fuente del Gavilan. The neighbors are always very friendly.!!
